attributes.action: Stop the Japanese from Comerecial Whaling
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please use this petition if you care about the cruel and barbaric trade in the slaughter of these magnificent creatures.  The announcement that Japan will up its quota to hunt Hump Back Whales is morally wrong when other countries are stopping hunting whales.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
